channel.title: How to make it so you cant be demoted
channel.description: When i log on ppl demote me on my server how do i make it so i cant be demoted?

item.title: How to make it so you cant be demoted
item.dc:creator: @chi-kitory chi-kitory
item.description:
@chi-kitory wrote:

dude thats weird. its must happen with quoting…

next time ill use what you did (java)

item.title: How to make it so you cant be demoted
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownersnamehere")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; yell(name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Why did you double space…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so you cant be demoted

item.title: How to make it so you cant be demoted
item.dc:creator: @chi-kitory chi-kitory
item.description:
@chi-kitory wrote:

if your owner do the “&& playerrights =3” at the end of the demote command. i wasnt trying show a point. sorry if you felt offended

or this

if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownersnamehere")) {

String name = command.substring(7);

try {

int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);

client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

c.playerRights = 0;

yell(name+" is no longer a member of staff");

} catch(Exception e) {

sM(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");

}

}

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it so you cant be demoted
